title: Change Cursor
body: I am having a very hard time seeing the cursor and wish there was an option to make it like really bright and standout. I have vision problems and nothing is helping me. Is there a way to change the cursor? I also don't want to get banned for changing anything without knowing.

replies.body: We don't have an official way to change the cursor I don't believe, but if you're having a hard time telling the colors apart from each other you might have an easier time with colorblind mode on.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=zr4L54LW,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-27T20:51:20.142+0000)
>
> We don't have an official way to change the cursor I don't believe, but if you're having a hard time telling the colors apart from each other you might have an easier time with colorblind mode on.

I do have it on I think. I will check next time I am in game to see. It's hard for me to see it when I have hovered over the dirt paths. Is it possible to change the files in the game to do it and will I get banned?
